title: YOUTUBE CLONE
description: I built a front-end clone of YouTube, focusing on recreating the iconic video platform's user interface. This project showcases my skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: DELISH
description: I built this website that helps people with recipes of different kinds of food from different country

title: MKCSS
description: A lightweight, modular, and customizable CSS framework designed to help developers build fast, responsive and beautiful websites. With a focus on simplicity and ease of use, MkCss provides a solid foundation for web development projects of all sizes.

title: LIFTING TOGETHER
description: This is a charity website created with React.
